Bend is the capital of Oregon.
Corvallis was once the the capital of Oregon.
Eugene was the first city to have one-way streets.
Bend is the beer capital of the world.
The Arnold Canal is in Deschutes County.
The source of the Columbia River is Crater Lake.
The Deschutes River was named by French-Canadian fur trappers.
Crater Lake is the deepest lake in the world.
Pilot Butte is the highest point in Oregon.
Oregon is the only U.S. state to feature different designs on both sides of its flag.
Oregon is the only state that has an official state nut.
